table.name: vtiger_servicemaintenance
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicemaintenance` ( `servicemaintenanceid` int(11) NOT NULL, `servicecommentsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `addtime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `finishtime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `isoptimize` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `issuetype` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `content` text, `timeconsuming` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `processstate` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `remark` text, PRIMARY KEY (`servicemaintenanceid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
